attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What is gained by having fortnightly collection of household waste?  It will not reduce the amount of waste it just allows it to build up and make everything dirtier and untidy, it's bad enough already.  I recycle all that I can from my home, what's in my dustbin is what the shops put around things.  That will encourage rats etc as you cannot wash those sort of wrappings.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
